name: makeSamlAuthnRequest
description: Make a SAML authentication request for a specified IdP Authentication Domain.

idp_name.description: Name of the IdP Authentication Domain to authenticate with.

body.description: Additional information associated with a single sign-on (SSO) authentication request.

$ul: **idpSsoUrl**: The SSO endpoint where the SAML authentication request is sent.
**relayState**: The SAML relay state associated with the SAML response and request.
**samlRequest**: SAML authentication request XML in base-64 encoding.
